title: Create a Flexbox Row Layout
description: Use flexbox to create a horizontal layout for elements inside a container with space-between alignment.

title: Grid with Two Columns
description: Create a 2-column CSS grid layout with equal width columns and a 20px gap.

title: Hover Color Change
description: Change the background color of buttons to green when hovered.

title: Style the First Letter
description: Use the ::first-letter pseudo-element to make the first letter of all paragraph text large and red.
hints: ::first-letter applies only to block container elements.

title: Fixed Position Navbar
description: Make a nav bar stick to the top of the page using position:fixed.
hints: position:fixed removes element from normal flow.

title: Transition on Hover
description: Add a transition so that when hovering a card, it smoothly scales up to 1.05.
hints: Use transform + transition for smooth animation.

title: Media Query for Small Screens
description: Create a media query that sets the body font-size to 14px when screen width is below 600px.

title: Specificity Challenge
description: Override a .btn class by using a more specific selector to make the text color red.

title: Center a Div (Classic Method)
description: Center a div horizontally using margin: auto and a set width.
hints: Block elements can auto-adjust left & right margins.

title: Absolute Positioning
description: Place a badge in the top-right corner of its parent using position:absolute;
hints: Absolute positioned elements use the nearest positioned ancestor.
